translation.en: I was just trying to make sure you're okay.
Keep it down! I'm trying to sleep here.
translation.es: Bajen la voz. Trato de dormir.

translation.en: Who are you? Where am I?
I don't know. I woke up here too, just like you.
translation.es: No sé, desperté aquí igual que tú.

translation.en: Hey! Who are you? Where am I?
Yeah, those are the top two questions.
Put the fists down, dude. We're all in the same boat. We're in a boat?
translation.es: - Sin peleas. Estamos en el mismo barco.- ¿Es un barco?

translation.en: So all three of us woke up in this place?
Uh, yeah. That's what it looks like.
This is definitely not a boat. I wouldn't trust him.
translation.es: Esto no es un barco. No confíes en él.

translation.en: Says the other guy I've never seen before.
So, where are we? And why are we here?
Can you guys think back to the last memory you had, before you woke up?
I was gonna say being pranked, but thanks for putting
translation.es: Iba a decir castigados,pero gracias por decirlo.

translation.en: -the whole "dead" thing in my head! -[scoffs] We're not dead.
translation.es: Iba a decir castigados,pero gracias por decirlo. No estamos muertos. No podemos estarlo.
No estamos muertos. No podemos estarlo.

translation.en: Whoa! An old typewriter. People used these before computers and smartphones.
translation.es: Una máquina de escribir. Se usaban antes.

translation.en: You could type up your last will and testament.
-Any idea how we can get out of here? -That vent?
-How can you not know your own name? -I don't know, okay?
I can't remember my name either.
Okay. So, what's your name then?
I don't know, but we have to try to get out. Come on, I'll boost you up.
translation.es: No sé, pero hay que tratar de salir.Ven, te impulsaré.

translation.en: Thanks, dude. Now can you put me down?
Okay, seriously, how do we get out of here?
Maybe we can loosen these cinder blocks somehow. Anybody got keys, something to scratch with?
translation.es: Tal vez podamos aflojar estos bloques.¿Tienen algo con que escarbar?

translation.en: Or maybe it's pronounced "Ky"? I like "Ky" better.
translation.es: Tal vez se pronuncia así. Me gusta.

translation.en: Someone must've put those in our pockets.
Okay, very funny, whoever you are!
It's "Ky"! I think. And if you're so smart, how do we get outta here?
translation.es: ¡Es Kai! Creo. - Si eres tan listo, ¿cómo saldremos?- Creo que debemos usar la máquina.

translation.en: I think we might have to do something with the typewriter.
translation.es: - Si eres tan listo, ¿cómo saldremos?- Creo que debemos usar la máquina.

translation.en: Oh, good idea! We'll smash the wall open!
translation.es: ¡Buena idea! - ¡Haré un agujero en la pared!- ¡No quise decir eso!

translation.en: Stop! That's not what I meant!
translation.es: - ¡Haré un agujero en la pared!- ¡No quise decir eso!

translation.en: Uh, what did you just do?

translation.es: Hay que escribir la palabra correcta.

translation.en: -I think we need to type the right word. -Okay, but what's the word?
translation.es: Hay que escribir la palabra correcta. ¿Qué palabra?

translation.en: This is ridiculous. And I just realized there's no toilet in here.
translation.es: Es ridículo, y me acabo de dar cuentade que no hay baño.

translation.en: -That's not helping! -Help! Wait! Maybe that's it!
[chuckles] "Help." That was it! You figured it out!
Okay. So I'm Mira. And I'm good at puzzles.
translation.es: Soy Mira y soy buena para los acertijos.

translation.en: -Whoa. -Big deal, I can do that too.
The grate is screwed in. We climb back down to the typewriter, bend one of those key thingies
translation.es: - Tiene tornillos.- Usaremos una tecla como destornillador.

translation.en: into a screwdriver and-- righty-tighty, lefty-loosey? Oh, maybe we can somehow freeze the screws and snap them off.
translation.es: Alojar y apretar.Podemos congelarlos y romperlos.

translation.en: -Right, that's me. -Jump over and grab the cinder block.
translation.es: Sí, soy yo. Salta, yo te subiré.
Salta, yo te subiré. - ¡No lo alcanzaré!- ¡Haz lo que dice!

translation.en: I'll crawl in first. You pull Mira up
translation.es: Iré primero. Sube a Mira, y síganme.

translation.en: -and follow me in the vent. -No way, dude.
translation.es: Iré primero. Sube a Mira, y síganme. - Ni hablar, no iré detrás.- ¿Por qué?
- Ni hablar, no iré detrás.- ¿Por qué?

translation.en: 'Cause I don't want my face up against your butt! I'll go first.
translation.es: No miraré tu trasero. Voy primero.

translation.en: [Mira] What are you doing? If anything attacks us, I can crawl away faster this way.
translation.es: - ¿Qué haces?- Puedo gatear rápido si algo nos ataca.

translation.en: There's something up there. Looks like another vent...
translation.es: Hay algo ahí. Parece otra ventilación.

translation.en: He doesn't know if it's safe.
It's gotta be safer than staying in here!
translation.es: Debe ser más seguro que aquí.

translation.en: I don't know. But, hopefully, we can find a road and get a ride outta here.
translation.es: Quizá encontremos un caminoy salgamos de aquí.

translation.en: You're Mira, you're good at puzzles, and apparently, you speak "owl."
translation.es: Eres Mira, buena para los acertijosy hablas con las lechuzas.

translation.en: I'm starting to think I'm pretty cool.
We should probably go before Kai realizes he's all alone up there.
translation.es: Vamos antes de que Kai sepa que está solo.

translation.en: [Kai] Hey! I'm all alone up here! Where are you guys?
It's really creepy out here, huh?
Like, really, really creepy. Wish we had a map.
A map would be good right now because it's really, really-- Creepy?
translation.es: - Un mapa nos vendría bien, es...- ¿Espeluznante?

translation.en: Kai, just try to relax. There's gotta be a road nearby.
translation.es: Intenta calmarte.Debe haber un camino cerca.

translation.en: Oh. Right, obviously, I knew that.
Hey! We should probably check our pockets for a map.
translation.es: Busquemos un mapa en los bolsillos.

translation.en: For the last time, we don't have a map.
translation.es: Por última vez, no tenemos un mapa.

translation.en: But we should check again. It wouldn't hurt.
translation.es: Ver de nuevo no hará daño.

translation.en: You'll definitely be hurting the next time you mention a map that we clearly don't have!
translation.es: Tú te harás daño si mencionas de nuevoun mapa que no tenemos.

translation.en: You stepped on another twig, right?
It was just a twig I stepped on! No need to panic!
translation.es: Pisé una rama. No se asusten.

translation.en: So, why us? What do you mean?
We obviously don't know each other, so what other connection do we have?
translation.es: No nos conocemos,¿qué otra relación tenemos?

translation.en: -[Kai gasps] Oof! -There must be a reason. What if we are connected somehow, but just can't remember?
translation.es: - Debe haber una razón.- Tal vez no la recordamos.

translation.en: Oof! Hey! You wanna watch-- oh! [grumbles]
Without our memories, it's pretty much impossible to know.
But how can all three of us not remember anything?
-Maybe we have insomnia. -I think you mean amnesia.
translation.es: - Quizá es insomnio.- Quieres decir amnesia.

translation.en: [chuckles] Uh, no. I slept really well, so I definitely don't have amnesia.
translation.es: No, duermo bien, no tengo amnesia.

translation.en: Somebody needs to buy a "theesorius"! Thesaurus!
Was he serious or was that a "dad joke"? It's a major concern either way.
translation.es: - ¿Lo dijo en serio o en broma?- De todos modos me preocupa.

translation.en: Someone really doesn't want us going over there.
-Or getting out of here. -Well, I'm getting out.
I don't get it. My hands should be toast.
Okay. That is definitely weirder than my owl thing.
translation.es: Eso es más extrañoque hablar con lechuzas.

translation.en: -What owl thing? -Come on, there must be a gate somewhere.
[Kai] So you're telling me you understood what it said?
-I don't know, okay? It was weird. -You're weird.
translation.es: - No sé, fue extraño.- Eres extraña.

translation.en: -What are you gonna do? -[sighs] Try not to die?
Unless, of course, we're already dead.
translation.es: A menos que ya estemos muertos.

translation.en: Where are you going? It could be people!
[Kai] Look at all that ancient stuff.
[Kai] There might be a power switch for the electric fence in there!
Mira, I'm not sure we should--
What? You scared? Oh, no, oh, the shack, oh, so spooky.
Hey, what if... what if we're someone's experiments?
translation.es: Oigan, ¿y si somosel experimento de alguien?

translation.en: So some mad scientist with crazy white hair and a ridiculous accent made us?
translation.es: ¿Nos creó un científico lococon canas y acento ridículo?

translation.en: It would explain this lab and why our memories are wiped.
translation.es: Explicaría el laboratorio y la amnesia.

translation.en: Maybe we're top secret government spies and just don't know it yet.
translation.es: Tal vez somos agentes secretosy no lo sabemos.

translation.en: I wish, but this stuff is really old and barely working.
translation.es: Todo esto es viejo y apenas funciona.

translation.en: Huh. You think we went back in time somehow?
Well, good to know I sound confident.
[Kai] Guys, you need to check this out.
There might be something in here we can use. Or explain what happened to us.
translation.es: - Busca algo que podamos usar.- O que explique qué pasó.

translation.en: -wrench, a bunch of old keys... -Hey, one of them might open the gate.
translation.es: Una linterna vieja,llave inglesa, llaves... Una debe abrir la puerta.

translation.en: Great! Can we get out of here now? Before those whatevers find us?
translation.es: ¿Podemos irnosantes de que esa cosa venga?

translation.en: Look, the forest, this shack, there's the fence.
translation.es: El bosque, la cabaña, la cerca.

translation.en: -Kai, look for a fence switch. -Who made you the leader?
-I never said I was the leader. -Why should I listen to you?
translation.es: - No dije eso.- ¿Por qué debo hacer lo que dices?

translation.en: -Don't! Go if you want! -Can you keep it down?
-You know exactly what I'm talking about! -Please, be my guest!
Continue running away, no one's stopping you!
Are you guys coming or not?
'Cause, seriously, I will leave you here... in a few minutes.
translation.es: En serio, los dejaré aquí...En unos minutos.

translation.en: We just wanna make sure we're not missing anything in here.
-Adam, maybe we should-- -You can go with him if you want.
translation.es: - Tal vez...- Ve con él si quieres.

translation.en: Whatever they are, they're not happy.
translation.es: Lo que sea que son, no están felices.

translation.en: I don't suppose you guys found any big muzzles in there, did you?
Don't think they'd let us put them on, dude. Come on!
-What are you gonna do? -Short it out!
That hurt? You obviously speak forehead, too.
[groans] Couldn't have found it ten seconds earlier, huh?
Hurry! They're gonna eat us alive! Not helping!
-The keys are stuck! Don't wait for me! -I won't!
translation.es: Se atoró, no me esperen. ¡Claro que no!

translation.en: Where else would you build a secret devil dog lab but at the edge of a cliff?
translation.es: ¿Qué mejor que un laboratorio secretoen un acantilado?

translation.en: So many questions! You really have no clue, do you?
I assume you'd like some help, hmm?
One teensy-weensy, little, tiny, little, teensy-weensy little thing.
So then, do you want my help or... not?
Excellent! I am pleased to be of assistance and will gladly help you.
translation.es: Genial. Será un placer ayudarlos.Antes, la palabra mágica.
Será un placer ayudarlos.Antes, la palabra mágica.

translation.en: -Magic word? Oh, come on! -What do you mean?
You think this is some kind of game!
